body_text:
Is Sasuke's new dojutsu same as Kaguya's third eye? SPOILERS AHEAD

 After Hagoromo Otsutsuki gives his Yin chakra to Sasuke, Sasuke develops a new dojutsu in his left eye. 



Is this dojutsu the same one as Kaguya and Madara's third eye? 

In both cases, the eyes have circles and tomoes in them.

What happened to the tomoe in Sasuke's Rinnegan? Sasuke's Rinnegan (pre-chapter 700) had six tomoe.

In Naruto Gaiden: The Seventh Hokage chapter 6, when Sasuke's Rinnegan is shown, it doesn't have the tomoe:


What happened to the tomoe in his Rinnegan? Is this an error or is there something else to it?
